description: Protect your 13 inch MacBook Air or MacBook Pro with this Neoprene Sleeve Case with Pocket from CaseCrown! Your MacBook deserves to be snug and secure with this case. One of the most unique features of this case is that it has an additional exterior pocket with a velcro closure, in which you can insert the iPad 4 / iPad 3 or any other 10 inch tablet. With this extra storage space you can also carry notes, business cards, credit cards, pens, pencils, phone, or other small accessories. You will have all your important necessities in one place. The interior of the case is smooth and soft to protect your MacBook from any damages, and the material will prevent scratches while you are carrying it around in the case. The case has two separate openings for your MacBook and the iPad 4 / iPad 3, which makes it easy for you to slip in or remove your devices. This case even has an extra pop of color on the interior for a stylish look. Because of its slim design, this case offers convenient mobility so you can just grab your MacBook and the iPad 4 / iPad 3 and be ready to go knowing it will be protected at all times.
title: CaseCrown Neoprene Sleeve Case (Pink) for 13 Inch Macbook Air / Macbook Pro with Retina Display + Pocket for iPad 4 / iPad 3
